name: Catch.io
description:
Catch.io is a two player downloadable game created by a small beginner team. In this game you are able to chase and fight each other in multiple areas.

In free demo version, you can choose from two levels, and a lots of colour skins. Abov the two pre-added background musics you can add your own music to the game (more information in audio/audio.conf file).

The first full version will be released of 1st of September 0:00 (CET) containing at least 20 levels and 50+ skins and colors. Catch.io will be updating regularly, new skins, levels and event will be added.

Feel free to comment your expressions, suggestions and even the bugs. We learn from our mistakes.

Enjoy our firs game - the Catch.io
